title: On the probabilistic metrizability of approach spaces
authors: Hongliang Lai, Lili Shen, Junche Yu
abstract:
We investigate approach spaces generated by probabilistic metric spaces with
respect to a continuous t-norm $*$ on the unit interval $[0,1]$. Let $k^*$ be
the supremum of the idempotent elements of $*$ in $[0,1)$. It is shown that if
$k^*=1$ (resp. $k^*<1$), then an approach space is probabilistic metrizable
with respect to $*$ if and only if it is probabilistic metrizable with respect
to the minimum (resp. product) t-norm.
